Package com.atakmap.android.tools

Class DrawingCircleCreationTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.Tool
      • com.atakmap.android.drawing.tools.CircleCreationTool
        • com.atakmap.android.tools.DrawingCircleCreationTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnKeyListener, MapEventDispatcher.MapEventDispatchListener, Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleCreationButtonTool
    public class DrawingCircleCreationTool
extends CircleCreationTool
    Tool for the creation of new drawing circles.

    Once the user has finished creating a circle with the tool, returns the uid of the newly created DrawingCircle in an intent specified by the user by setting the "callback" parcelable when starting the tool. This is an intent to fire when the tool is completed.
